Content.Text: Hey, wake up! I said, WAKE UP!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is no time for sleep. One of
your animals gave birth. Hurry to
the barn!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's the newborn. Hurry up and give
her a name.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmph. I guess that'll do. Make sure you
take good care of her.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Man, I'm so sleepy. Just take care of
the rest, will ya?
